related.meaning: langit, langit ketinggian tinggi, udara atas
tepat di atas, tepat di atas kepala
masa depan seseorang, kesejahteraan seseorang, sejarah pribadi seseorang

idioms.word: 細工は流々仕上げを御覧じろ
idioms.reading: さいくはりゅうりゅうしあげをごろうじろ
idioms.meaning: don't complain until the job is finished

lessons.japanese: 君はもうその仕事を仕上げてしまったのですか。
lessons.indonesian: Have you finished the work yet?

lessons.japanese: 金曜日までに何とか原稿を仕上げられますか。
lessons.indonesian: Can you manage to complete the manuscript by Friday?

lessons.japanese: 急いで内容紹介パンフレットを仕上げて下さい。
lessons.indonesian: Please hurry and finish the prospectus.

lessons.japanese: 期限前にこの仕事を仕上げなさい。
lessons.indonesian: You must get the job done before the deadline.

lessons.japanese: 我々は休み前に仕事を仕上げたかったのだが。
lessons.indonesian: We hoped to have done with the work before the holidays.

lessons.japanese: 我々は、一日中かかってもその仕事を仕上げてしまうつもりだ。
lessons.indonesian: We'll finish the work even if it takes us all day.

lessons.japanese: ユミは１日でそれを仕上げられません。
lessons.indonesian: Yumi can't finish it in a day.

lessons.japanese: ユミがそれを１日で仕上げるのは不可能です。
lessons.indonesian: It is impossible for Yumi to finish it in a day.

lessons.japanese: パズルのここの部分が仕上がらない。
lessons.indonesian: I can't finish this part of the puzzle.

lessons.japanese: できるだけ早く仕上げて下さい。
lessons.indonesian: Get it done as soon as possible.

lessons.japanese: ついに我々はその困難な仕事を仕上げた。
lessons.indonesian: At last, we got through with the hard work.

lessons.japanese: それを仕上げる前に作業をやめる時間となるだろう。
lessons.indonesian: It will be quitting time before you get that done.

lessons.japanese: それは１日か２日で仕上がる。
lessons.indonesian: It will be finished in a day or two.
